meaningMnemonic: You have <radical>fingers</radical> in the <radical>thousand</radical>s and while looking up at the <radical>sun</radical> you decide you want to <kanji>insert</kanji> them in there.
readingMnemonic: You <kanji>insert</kanji> one finger, it burns up immediately, and its <reading>sou</reading>l (そう) comes flying out screaming for a moment before it disappears. Hmm. You insert another finger and as it burns up, another little soul comes out screeching, "WHY WOULD YOU INSERT ME IN THERE!" and is gone.
